website_summaries.verdict: A unique concept with a lot of different uses, but it lacks quality in some areas and requires patience to assemble.
pros: Extra" space includes a hidden storage compartment and top shelf that can be opened for laptop use
cons: Some components are made of weaker particle board
Finish is prone to chipping with regular use

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Typical Sauder assembly. Takes about 1-2 hours to assemble. I like that the table top rises to a proper level. I have had others that are just too tall when raised, but this one is perfect. No trouble with tipping.
customer_reviews.author: ZKnox1

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this item look extremely chintzy, it also goes together cock-eyed. One of the legs is a good half inch off the ground because the pieces don't go together levelly. My husband spent a good hour putting it together only to have to take it apart so we could send it back. this is NOT worth the money at all. I can get something made from solid pine and finished for only a few dollars more. Also, this is the second piece of Sauder furniture I have returned from the same order. Just because it's made in the USA doesn't mean it's quality.
customer_reviews.author: trbobtch

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, it's exactly what I was looking for. This is perfect for days when I want to work on my laptop in the living room. It's also perfect for my son to do school work or if we decide to eat while watching a movie. The table looks nice and feels very sturdy. Love the inside storage and open shelves below as well. And the price was great! I'd definitely recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMyKids

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee table. I bought this along with the matching TV stand and end table. The top lifts up and there is plenty of storage underneath...I have 2 blankets in there. Even though it isn't real wood, it really is a nice piece of furniture...and for the price, you can't beat it! I added baskets for additional storage.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Cute & affordable little table!
customer_reviews.text: This table arrived packaged VERY well! (Seriously, I'm impressed that every piece arrived in pristine condition, but that's also to be credited to UPS or whoever delivered it) The table was simple enough for me to put together by myself. As many other people commented, you can see the particle board showing through at the corners of each piece, but I just used a brown Sharpie to cover them before I put it together. I haven't "pulled" the table around because I don't want to risk breaking the bottom shelf but I was considering adding some wheels to make moving it easier. But so far it looks nice and it is convenient having the lift-top!
customer_reviews.author: alaskachik17

customer_reviews.title: Have someone help with assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this table by myself and definitely struggled with attaching the top to the table, the instructions even suggested two people, but as I live alone and COVID has me socially distancing, I didn't have another option. Be cautious about this if you're in the same position. (If you don't care about the top of the table opening up you'll be fine though- that's the only part of the assembly that was difficult for 1 person to handle.) Product overall is great though, very sturdy and looks pretty nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This table is actually really nice. I know it’s not real wood and that might bother some people but for the price it’s a nice table. Can’t find real wood for 100 bucks. I like the table top lift feature, it’s perfect for using a lap top or eating. Just raise the top up and it’s the right height. Storage is adequate, and the finish is decent. Putting it together wasn’t bad either, maybe took me an hour or so. Overall, it’s a very sturdy table and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: one of the pieces were missing a predrilled hole
customer_reviews.text: One of the keg pieces was missing a predrilled hole. Th table weighs what felt like a 100 pounds. I have back problems and was not going to undo all I did then have to luggi this thing to have it shipped back so I drilled my own little hole just to complete the build but the integrity of the table has been compromised. Not as sturdy as it should be. So very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This table is incredibly functional, sturdy, and looks great for this price point. I put most of it together by myself one morning while 7 months pregnant and only needed a second set of hands for the last step of attaching the top to the rest of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy project
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice coffee table that has a lifting top to bring your computer or supper dish up to you while sitting on the couch. It is made of engineered wood but has high quality springs and hardware that make this a nice addition to my living room. Hats off to Sauder for designing this relatively easy to assemble and sharp looking table.
customer_reviews.author: L. Meister

customer_reviews.title: As cheap as expected, flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This brand has never impressed me. I was looking for an inexpensive coffee table for short term. I expected low quality and I got low quality. This table was extremely time consuming to assemble. The end product is cheap and anything but sturdy. The lift top is nice to have (with additional storage underneath), but lifting it up is quite a task. It is so wobbly that one wrong pull and you'll rip the whole top off. Not worth it, in my opinion. Looks fine from afar, but too low of quality and too time consuming to make it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy A.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in February, I recently noticed the lift top was loose, The screws became loose and could not be tightened. So I contacted Sauder, they are sending a replacement top. I have to say they made the warranty process painless. I would recommend buying if it's in your price range. It's not solid oak furniture but it is certainly very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Solid, looks good, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I needed something like this to get my laptop up and store various things I have floating around the room. I was a little worried with some of the 1-stars, but they just don't apply to what I got. I think it looks great, it's sturdy, and it's very stable even with the table in the raised position. For the price, this was an absolutely excellent option. My only complaint, and not worth taking a star off for, is that the edges, especially the corners, are sharp. If small kids are a concern, spend a few bucks on corner protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Kemanorel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Coffee table is perfect for our needs. The table is the perfect height when lifted. Good storage under the top. Was not difficult to put together, but time consuming. I think my 18 yr old son got it together in about an hour and a half to two hours. The only time he needed assistance was when attaching the top, just to have someone hold it up and steady it for him to screw it together. The only issue we have had is that it's a little difficult to get the top to push back down, the whole coffee table goes sliding across our wood floors. So, we just have to hold it in place while pushing it down.
customer_reviews.author: C. Birkenfeld

customer_reviews.title: It fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Loved the function of this table. But after using it for less than a year, it started to fall apart. The cams somehow came out, which I’ve never seen before on home assembly furniture. So the legs spread out and nothing really went back together. The middle support legs then came apart. I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Looked good on paper and the first few weeks but...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to assemble, the final table lift was tricky but I managed it on my own. It looks quite nice and the lift works well, but the more I live with it the more I dislike it. It has sharp edges, I have scars to prove it. The top has started to pit and bubble, due to liquids falling on it. The edges are starting to come away, and not just where I bump into it. Just a little to high, but this is exacerbated by the fact it has sharp edges, which can make make putting feet up painful. And my mistake: not long enough. I'm now looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this thing is very nice. Took a bit of time to put together but it was easy. Instructions are clear and precise. Overall it looks fantastic even though it is a bit smaller then I had thought. Still I like it and it works well. Table hold weight well as I have had meals on it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Moran

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Update~ I have had this since March now and it scratches VERY easy! It is pretty frustrating since we are really careful so I am not really sure how it is happening. I wouldn't recommend it if it is a table that is used often. Wasn't that hard to put together. My 15yr old son and I put it together in less then 2 hours. It cute and better quality then I thought it was going to be. I am happy with this purchase and I will probably buy the side tables as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! Bought this for my father for Christmas. Finish is not smooth. When you dust it the rag gets caught on whatever this is made out of. Springs on lift were very tight to begin with but have loosened. Would have been nice if they had made it so that you could access the items that you place inside the coffee table. As it is, the table lifts up and you have to reach around the lifted top to access items stored inside! Like I said, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Berens

customer_reviews.title: Tricky construction
customer_reviews.text: I find Sauder furniture usually easy to assemble. This one was easy until the spring loaded lid. In fairness, Sauder was very specific that two people were needed for that part but I had no second available so I used a combo of pillows and books to steady one end while I installed the other end. Very happy with the result. I can watch TV and eat my meal without hunching over my plate. Very civilized.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a very interesting design and the packaging job is equally interesting. I say this because it came in an impossibly small package. It takes a good while to assemble, as it comes broken down into the most basic pieces, hence the marvelous packaging job. It's pretty easy to put things on backwards, so mind the instructions. Overall, you're getting exactly what you expect. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: A trade-off
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to put together, just "lots of screwing," as my kid said. Somewhat disappointing that is REALLY looks like a piece of particle board furniture. The edges of the top are sharp and the lighter color is noticeable. It definitely says "this is not a piece of furniture for a real adult." HOWEVER, I chose it for the lift-up function, so it will serve well for eating and studying at the couch.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to build but very good instructions. Be careful - it's press board
customer_reviews.text: Complicated to build but very good instructions. Be careful - it's press board. I built it in sections - 2 sides, top compartment, bottom, and the adjustable top with hardware. Then I wrapped each in blankets, transported in trunk of car, and carried to apartment of person who I was buying it for. Then I spent a few minutes putting it together. Otherwise the weight would have made it difficult to safely move around and up steps.
customer_reviews.author: P2

customer_reviews.title: Great table - design made upgrading easy.
customer_reviews.text: Table is made from good quality particle board. It is heavy and feels solid after construction. I'm actually impressed with the wood grain detail. In the boards. Did not take long to construct. Took my time and watched two episodes of The Witcher. Lol I spray painted mine to fit my decorum, black top n grey bottom. I also added 1in upholstery tacks to give it a more "castle" vibe. Going to add handles on the short sides too. Overall a great little table for the price and a little creativity really made it really unique.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious, sturdy, still works, SHARP EDGES
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of use, the table looks and functions as it did the day I put it together. Pretty good for the price! The concept of an elevating coffee table top is ingenious. It's very sturdy (provided you don't forcibly bump into it when the table top is raised) and secure enough for 2 people to eat dinner off of. One HUGE warning: EVERY SINGLE EDGE IS RAZOR SHARP. I've stubbed my toes on the razor sharp metal leg corners. I've ran my knee into the razor sharp table edge. There is not a round edge on this thing. When the table top is extended, it's pretty much at toddler head height...
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful table, for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table, for the price. I have always trusted Sauder products and this one, is no exception. Underneath the lift-top, is plenty of room for storage - I store my laptop and its accessories. The lift-top is easy to operate and the movement is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R

customer_reviews.title: BROKE after a few months!!
customer_reviews.text: COMPLETELY FELL APART!!! Useless now. This table was great at first! I got it since I’m teaching from home. Great storage, looked nice. However, after only 6 months, it is completely broken. We assembled it properly, and took care of it. But it is just not made well. Cheap wood that broke around the nails (see photos). Definitely disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: Loving this table!
customer_reviews.text: It went together easy enough, probably 45 mins total assembly, and you definitely need a second pair of hands for attaching the top. It looks great and works great! It can go up and down easily with two hands, still possible with one. I find this helpful for a TV dinner or for getting closer to intricate work. 5 stars all day, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Been Jammin'

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to build but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: You will need actual tools for this one. No little allen wrench included like with that cheap Ikea junk. The instructions are very clear but this will still require time, patience, and a friend at some point. For the price, this coffee table was worth it. The lift top is super sturdy and gentle to lift and close. Nice amount of storage space and a quality finish. The box was a little damaged from shipping but the packaging was good enough to protect the items. Also the table is heavier than it looks you will definitely need some help with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Check all pieces before starting assembly
customer_reviews.text: The table seems like it will look pretty decent once assembled. Mine is and broken so that wasn't an option for me. Let me tell you, trying to get all these pieces back Into the box will seriously piss you off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike dro

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint of heart
customer_reviews.text: I’ve built a lot of furniture, even IKEA, without much trouble. But this was a more difficult build. It for sure needs two people because there are pieces that need to be held a certain way while someone else puts in the bolts. And the material is not forgiving; I put the bottom shelf on upside down, and when I tried to remove the screws it took out a big chunk of the particle board. Unfortunately, I messed up the build a bit and the table doesn’t look its best. But I think if two people built it and you took your time and double-checked the instructions, it could look pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fooish

customer_reviews.title: Great despite manufacturing error
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table! However, I was extremely disappointed to find that one of the legs didn't have the holes drilled into it properly. You can even see a white "X" where i guess it was supposed to be drilled. Luckily the holes were only for the metal part on top of the legs and a rubber stopper - so nothing was weight-bearing or else it would have been impossible to assemble. Besides the manufacturing mistake, the table is terrific and definitely supports my laptop and several books. It already looks very sleek as a normal coffee table and people are amazed when i lift it up into a table! Also you do need two people to assemble it!
customer_reviews.author: mmccart

customer_reviews.title: 1 year life span
customer_reviews.text: I waited one year to write a review of this product as it's a piece of furniture and should last a lifetime it's made out of particle board with a veneer over it which I was well aware of looking at the pictures unfortunately the pieces began to fall off after gentle use as I'm literally never home if your intent is to buy a coffee table for one year until you can afford a nicer stuff this is good what if your plan is to use it for more than that move on
customer_reviews.author: Donald whelihan jr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I will begin with the caveat that for the past 7 years I have had a $40 coffee table from the Christmas tree shops, that has held up beautifully. In fact I kept it after seeing the subpar quality of this table upon receipt. This table is entirely pressboard construction, after less than 5 months of use, all of the joints are coming apart, anchored bolts are coming out etc. this product is NOT durable, and is not worth your time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: I gave 3 stars because I like the style of this coffee table otherwise I would ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 stars because I like the style of this coffee table otherwise I would give it 2 stars. I discovered during assembly that boards are laminated particle board. Some of the pieces were already cracked and peeling at the screw holes. The directions were not very helpful and at the very end of assembly it is recommended that you have two people to finish assembling the lift off top. What if there isn't another person around? I have this sitting unfinished and very disappointed in how many screws came through the side of the boards. I would return it if I could lift it to send it back. If you do decide to purchase pay for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool inexpensive piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool inexpensive piece of furniture. Of course it was kind of a pain in the butt to put it together but that is the case with most of these things that you have to put together yourself because you don't pay very much for them. It had a few scratches but otherwise was in good condition. It is very sturdy and The Lift Top is the best part of the whole thing. I lift it up and down at least 2 or 3 times a day. It is sturdy and seems to be holding up
customer_reviews.author: Rhettex

customer_reviews.title: sander lift top Coffee table
customer_reviews.text: love the table! put together myself until the top, which requires two people, one to hold in place. will be very handy! received six days earlier than expected!
customer_reviews.author: llc56

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item to use as a coffee table and storage space. We tend to use TV tables for meals occasionally and they are top heavy and tipsy. This table flips up and acts like a dining table and then retracts when meal is done. There is ample storage area under tabletop. The table is heavy and sturdy. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dolley

customer_reviews.title: Warrenty and service makes this a deal.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were great. Table looks beautiful. We had a little damage on 1 corner of the top but sauder customer service was so easy to use. Just went online and filled out and online form and a few days later a new top was at my door. The great warrenty and service makes up for the lower quality of the materials. I think this was a great investment for our livingroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table. Assembly small issues
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Pleased. Only issue I had was with the assembly. Impossible to put together with one person, def need two people. Two of the pre drilled holes on the bottom of that you put the little things in to connect bottom to the sides we’re not drilled correctly so they wouldn’t fit. Had to drill out more space in order for them to be flush and to tighten them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Catlett

customer_reviews.title: :-( not happy
customer_reviews.text: I could not complete step 18 cause the brace is short and does not Mach with the holes for the screws to be put on place or the color! The color is black does not match the color of the table, also one of the hidden cams came defective too not really happy about it, if all this tree things were to be fix then I will give this table a 5 stars rating cause once is all together it looks really nice. Can they sjust be me the right pices to finish my table please.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Villegas

customer_reviews.title: This lasted for almost two years with light use
customer_reviews.text: It was not hard to assemble and the lift top storage is awesome. Nearly two years later, the table has come apart. The bottom section fell off - the legs don't stay with the top - constantly have to push them back in. The storage part is still intact and the table stands, but it is wobbly and has chip marks where the bottom section pulled away from the table. Too bad as it looked nice and has the storage feature. This had very lite use -rarely opened it. We just moved it on occasion to make room, and just budging it an inch makes it come literally unglued and unattached.
customer_reviews.author: Changdemom

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the lift top for eating and laptop use in ...
customer_reviews.text: This will take you a moment to assemble though if you follow each step perfectly you will have no trouble. Enjoy the lift top for eating and laptop use in front of the tv. It is sturdy enough to sit on though would not recommend climbing onto to reach something. It did support 250lbs when sitting on the table top. Composite boards with laminate wood grain finish.
customer_reviews.author: The_Asian

customer_reviews.title: Great table for great price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a super cute table. It makes me living room look nice and spacious. I like the storage compartment. It took me longer than usual to assemble but I have kiddos that like to see what mommy's doing. I enjoyed putting it together the instructions were super easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: This table is exactly what I expected for the price; it looks nice but it is particle board. My only complaint is that there was a tiny nick, in of all places, the table top along the front edge. I used one of those pens for scratches in furniture and it is now barely noticeable. I was shocked at how easy it was to assemble and that credit goes to the manufacturer for supplying a very good instruction manual. It was so easy, in fact, that not a single cuss word came out of my mouth while putting it together. I think that's a first.
customer_reviews.author: Twoscoopz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son had just purchased his first home and wanted furniture for Christmas, so we got him this. It is heavy and sturdy (not cheap particle board). He needed help putting it together and the instructions were incorrect in one part and they had to go back and redo the top, but other than that it wasn't a problem. It is nice looking, has hidden storage and the lift top makes it easy when he's using his laptop from the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Expectations should be set appropriately for the price paid. The instructions were clearer than most, so long as you view pictures and read carefully. Parts were labeled well. Assembly took close to three slow-and-steady hours. The final product is "fine" and meets but does not exceed expectations. I was hoping that the compressed wood laminate would not be obvious and the unit might pass for real wood. No luck there, but, again, price paid. Some of the pieces had small chips. I'll use a stain pen on those. Overall the table will serve my needs sufficiently for awhile but at some point I'll want to replace with a genuine wood product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Now that it is assembled, I am very happy with this coffee table. For the price, it would be tough to beat. That being said, assembly was very tough for me. Not sure I'd buy it again, if I knew how hard that was going to be. And, of course, it does look like particle board, but overall, it is a very useful and reasonably attractive piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: M. SOMERVILLE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Coffee Table.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son to replace the one he once had. It was difficult to find a table in cherry and this was perfect. Love the swing up table top, great for eating and doing computer work while watching TV. I would recommend this table and company to anyone. The top came with a chip in it, called Sauder and they replaced it no questions asked. That is a stand up company! Remember though, it is not solid cherry, it is a beautiful laminate, done very well. For this price one could hardly expect solid cherry.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: The table is just ok. It takes several hours to build and it’s easy to scratch the finish. Some sides of the panels are not even finished so it’s easy to tell that it’s particle board. The price should be closer to $100. The final product looks good though and is the right size for the space I have. The lift feature of course is also nice. I’m ok with it for now the but I probably wouldn’t by it again and only recommend if you need cheap coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Ignore those reviews that said the instructions were horrible. These are the most comprehensive and organized instructions I've ever dealt with when putting together furniture. Everything was labeled and neatly packaged. Nothing was missing. I was able to build it myself without any assistance. Advice - just put two throw pillows between the lift top and the table when screwing in lift mechanism to the table. One bad thing about it is that the finish is kind of rough. I will probably buy a wood finish to polish it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kratos

customer_reviews.title: READ CAREFULLY THERE ARE DISCREPANCIES ON THE PAGE THAT WILL MAKE A DIFFERENCE!
customer_reviews.text: On the page it states "Assembled length 52" but item dimensions are 43". I mistakenly bought this believing the 52" length...WRONG. It also states there are 2 drawers...There are ZERO drawers. So, I'm not real happy after assembling this and finding it way short for my sofa. Lets see 52-43=9 inches short. Not even the box it came in was 52".
customer_reviews.author: Georgette M. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Good look/poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials: low density particle board, paper veneer, edges are not finished. If I hadn't assembled it I would be returning it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ravens Fan

customer_reviews.title: A great multitasker
customer_reviews.text: The table is slim, keeping valuable floor space in my small livingroom. Lift up top is fantastic! Tight, but seats 3 for dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Concrete Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted and expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's what we were looking for to use in our trailer. Our goal was to have more living space so we got rid of the free-standing dinette and chairs. It works fine for two (we rarely have others but use TV trays as needed) and provided storage space for DVD cases, remotes (DVD, Cable/DVR Receiver, TV, etc.) and let me bring in a recliner for better relaxation. Construction took my wife about 50 minutes and she only needed me to hold the tabletop for a couple of minutes to secure the hinges. We put simple DG wicker baskets in the bottom sections for storage and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: EdC

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bottom middle support broke in 2 slides of the table. I wouldnt set anything on it like a plate or drink as moisture will break it down. I wouldnt set anything that could cause a mark. It easily scratches. But the storage is nice and the height to bring up the table is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with this coffee table. Took about two hours in total to set up, but the directions were very clear and easy to follow. We are loving the lifting ability, as we tend to eat at the coffee table and it makes this much easier. The color is also very pretty and matches our other cherry/walnut furniture perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and needed for the living room. Great looking, sturdy table. We had a little trouble with assembly, but that probably could have been avoided had we actually followed the directions as closely as we should have. We've gotten lots of compliments on the this table. It was a great find.
customer_reviews.author: TTzmommy

customer_reviews.title: cracked top.replacement cracked also!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this looked like it would be a nice table except upon opening the box ,there was a large crack in the top of the table,not sure if this was from the manufacturer or the shipper as it was lying at the top of my porch steps.replacement table sent also has a crack in the top and a chip on the side!!!extremely upset !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: buddy1331

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. All particle board with laminate cover. Square edges. It's pretty easy to install everything. For the price i think you could get something a little nicer from walmart even. I don't expect the laminate surface to last long... I would send it back but i imagine the hassle of that isnt worth the time. It does its job and doesn't look terribly bad so 3*.
customer_reviews.author: John Burmeister

customer_reviews.title: Good table for the price, real wood equivalent is 4 or 5 times the price.
customer_reviews.text: If anyone has ever put furniture together before than this is no problem. Not for 1st timers. From unboxING to sorting to completion 1 hour. If you use a power drill turn down torque setting to like 4 or 5. Or a lower setting. If it's up high you will break it, especially on the cams locks. You may see other pics where they say it was broken but they actually torque the cam lock to tight and it pulls upward and breaks. Past experience. All in all its good for the price. Very functional. Would have given 5 stars if it was real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Rlanderson

customer_reviews.title: Liftop is the perfect solution for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this coffee table for 6 months now and it has far surpassed our expectations. The lift top is smooth and lifts easily. We use that feature almost nightly as our table. Assembly was easy and straightforward- my husband built it in less than 2 hours without a grumble. One side note- the edges are indeed very sharp. Something to be weary of with young kids running around.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far is really nice item for the price. Will update in time One important thing for you to know - edges are really sharp, dont buy if you have small kids !! Assembly wasn't to hard, but I love doing that. A little above average complication. And thank you for well done assembly instructions - they really made my day .
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: We've been very pleased with the quality of this lift-top coffee table
customer_reviews.text: We've been very pleased with the quality of this lift-top coffee table, esp. considering the price. The lift top mechanism works well, and the interior storage under the top is a bonus. It's great to have a functional piece of furniture that's also attractive. Anyone purchasing it just needs to be aware that it's of sturdy but heavy construction, and that assembling it will require some effort and patience. But the instructions are pretty decent, and with the help of a good battery-powered drill and the right screwdrivers, you'll get there.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, assembly is a bit tricky
customer_reviews.text: Overall an excellent table for the price. It's simple, understated, and functional. A few words of advice: 1) Assembly step 17 of 19 requires two people (one person to hold the tabletop while the other screws the brackets to the rest of the table). I live alone and wound up having it sitting unfinished in my living room for 5 days before a friend could make it over to help me finish. 2) When you're assembling, be sure to remove the label stickers; some of them lie right at a joint and are impossible to completely get rid of once it's all together.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table AND Storage Solution
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful edition to our living room.... before we had this massive table for a coffee table. I knew we needed something smaller but didn't want to lose storage. This is great because we can store things inside and underneath so that they are out of sight. I was happy to find something that was close in color with our other pieces too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Table
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee table! It’s not terribly difficult to put together, and the instructions have some jokes scattered throughout which I thought was nice. I know the selling point is to work on your laptop from the table, but I like to eat in front of the TV sometimes and this table pulls up to be the perfect height for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in look
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more with this piece. The pull up table is hard to use - takes force to lift and the look of the "wood" is not great. I am using it as a temporary tv stand for now and then will figure out what to do with it. May put it outside on the patio - does not make the cut for livingroom furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy and holds 2 trays easily - no concerns about ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for us. Very small house and we use it to eat on while watching TV. Very functional. Can assemble single-handedly; took me about an hour. Had to tighten the nuts a couple times. Quite sturdy and holds 2 trays easily - no concerns about either weight or space. Only complaint is the sharp corners. Wish they were more rounded. Finish has become a bit worn in a few spots - the veneer is not the most durable. I don't think we are particularly hard on it - it just isn't able to stand up to daily use as solid wood might. Not perfect, but suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Earthling

customer_reviews.title: Whats the point
customer_reviews.text: The material of this product is cheap and not at all wood. putting it together is ridiculous and not sturdy at all. especially its super heavy..and not a one person to assemble. some of the pieces wont even fit and some easily breaks off.
customer_reviews.author: 4getMeKnot

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: Putting this table together was a nightmare. It's worth paying someone to put it together. If you found the assembly easy, then two thumbs up to you because it was a booger for me. After wrestling with the assembly and finally getting the table fully assembled, there was a chip on the top and we noticed there was a slight separation in two of the corners on one end. I hate this table. We bought it for our cabin because it has a real rustic look and feel, but we are now retiring it to the back porch to stack things on.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy & Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table about 9 months ago and it is falling apart. The rising mechanism is fine (which is why this review is not 1 star) but the top is all scuffed despite our use of coasters. Also a side peice just fell off when we were watching tv tonight. Not worth the money for how long it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Haney

customer_reviews.title: not real wood
customer_reviews.text: You last purchased this item on May 9, 2016. I had to throw this product away, in January 2020, I wish it was made out real wood. It was damaged while moving by some scotch tape. Skin came off with tape.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice peice but there was damage. I ordered it in Jan and just put it together. I was waiting for my new sectional to arrive before putting it together. It's been too long for me to return it so I had to use a sharpie to color in the damaged edge. Too bad its right on the edge you see right away when you walk in the room. I love the color and it's very sturdy. Just not happy that it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: C. Walkus

customer_reviews.title: What a cheap piece of crap. Came out of the box damaged
customer_reviews.text: What a cheap piece of crap. Came out of the box damaged, was difficult to put together, more damage, and after it was all said and done, fell apart when trying to move it in place. And yes, I put it together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak Finish.
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Sturdy and serves its purpose. Only complaint is that if you drip anything on it, it will bubble the finish if you don't dry it up fast. Have a few spots on the top where we dripped some water condensation on the table and didn't see it in time to avoid that blemish.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Krider

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with the table. It was packaged so well. Not one piece was out of place. The directions helped to assemble easily. It is a heavy piece of furniture. Sauder is still my choice for well built furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap particle board construction with a very fake looking printed veneer. Imagine a poster picture of a coffee table glued onto a cheap particle board coffee table. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: 2HCTC

customer_reviews.title: excellent table
customer_reviews.text: this table was more than i expected. I admit it did take some time and patience to assemble but the product was well worth it.love the fact you can sit on sofa and use the lift top to get things within reach. it sure beats having a low table that you have to bow down to place things on or get things. well worth the investment. good quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful after you assemble it! Love the color of the wood! Heavy when you receive it as a whole, but the individual parts are not heavy. Only drawback is that I took about 3 to 3.5 hours to assemble by myself, you do need someone for the last step and that takes a bit of time.
customer_reviews.author: Vjay S.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: It was tedious to put together but very very easy. It looks amazing and they added a lot of extra packaging so the table doesn’t arrive scratched or dented. Honestly I love it, so glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table & great value
customer_reviews.text: This coffee table is great! It was mostly easy to assemble, but you definitely need two people, especially when it comes to installing the moving top onto the body of the table. It's very sturdy, but not actual wood it seems. I love it, and it looks and functions great! Nothing was broken or chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 5th wheel travel trailer. The quality and appearance are very nice considering it is manufactured wood. During the last stage of assembly (about 1 hour) I discovered the table top was cracked. I called Sauder about the top and they are sending me a new one. It was a very pleasant experience talking with Barb.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the lift-top coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the lift-top coffee table!!!! It makes my living room look complete and adds character to the room. The second to best part is that is has the extra storage space. My favorite feature is the lift-top. It is great while you are eating or using a laptop by the couch. I decided to put it together myself and I was able to do most of it myself; however towards the end I did need someone to hold the table top while I secured it with the proper screws. Some instructions were a tiny bit confusing but nothing that you can't figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalia Perez

customer_reviews.title: It melts
customer_reviews.text: This table is a nice fit. It was true to the measurements, and looks very nice. Now the down side..IMPORTANT!!! Do not place and drink on thus table without a coaster, and if something spills wipe it up right away. The particle board is not sealed and moisture will make it bubble..
customer_reviews.author: 20Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Table
customer_reviews.text: Love the open top design. This looks very nice and is pretty sturdy. Its also a great size for a coffee table. Has a little storage but not a lot. Assembly is not difficult but takes a while.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Cutshaw

customer_reviews.title: Better be handy because this is all pieces
customer_reviews.text: Better be handy because this is all pieces. Don't make a mistake, if you put in a screw and have to remove and assemble again, it won't hold well. Didn't realize it was a 'kit' to put together and not real wood, junk pressed board that will not last very long. The finish is also easy to chip and scratch. Of course they don't tell you that in their listing.
customer_reviews.author: StormMaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this table from a couple of different retailers for almost a year. On Cyber Monday, I had decided to purchase from the another retailer but decided to check Amazon first. Amazon's price was less than half of the other retailer. After looking at reviews, decided to purchase and attempt assembly at home. I am so glad I did. All the pieces were labeled properly and the assembly took around an hour with fantastic results. I would definitely recommend and would purchase other Sauder products in the future. The manufacture also provided a QR code that pulled up an instructional You Tube video to aid in assembly - fantastic feature!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We love how easy this was to assemble! Our living room looks great with this piece. We also like how the top of the table opens so that we can store our remotes and blankets in the table. Great piece and value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Williams

customer_reviews.title: Glorified cardboard
customer_reviews.text: Material quality is essentially thick cardboard, feels cheap and flimsy. I would not buy this again. We have a different one I bought from a furniture store that cost slightly more, but is actually wood.
customer_reviews.author: P$

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps if I had never purchased Sauder furniture before, or a lift top table before, or any other furniture before; I wouldn't be as disappointed as I am. I've purchased Sauder in the past and it was QUALITY inexpensive furniture. This is garbage. I've purchased "put it together" furniture in the past and it's STILL in great shape. I was looking to update my look. This is cheap looking veneer its not even real looking veneer. And the top, heaven forbid you lean on it a bit, the whole thing lifts off the floor. I wouldn't put anything other than an iPad or a single plate on it. The center foot doesn't even touch the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I will like it if it ever gets put together
customer_reviews.text: This table is still sitting on the floor in a million pieces. Perhaps I will like it if it ever gets put together. the pieces just don't fit right together, no matter what you do.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece in my living room! NEED 2 PEOPLE TO BUILD
customer_reviews.text: When I found this I knew I had to have it. has a lot of storage, beautiful in person. The one thing you will need is at least one extra set of hands, with two people it took about 2-2.5 hours to put together. But once it was done, man was it sturdy!! I really love it
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: The lift top does not open smooth and evenly so ...
customer_reviews.text: The lift top does not open smooth and evenly so you have to be careful to ensure you are opening it that way especially if there is something on top at the time. Also, the little screw cover caps don't stay on well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great table but keep it dry
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lift top table with storage. We are using it in our Airbnb unit where we have placed coasters but someone put wine in a paper cup and left it over night and it soaked through the coaster and evidently it went through the surface and caused swelling in the wood fiber construction. We liked the table so well that we got another one just like it to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and assembled Sauder furniture in the past. Things have changed. Instead of real wood veneers, I got vinyl. Some aspects of the assembly were more challenging than I expected (to be fair, one step reccomended that there be two people, which was not possible, so my struggle could have been diminished with a second person). However, in view of the price, the finished product looks good and functions as well as I could have hoped for, so I am not unhappy, just less happy than I was hoping to be. All in all, a better value than some others I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Carroll

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble but it is a pressed cardboard table.
customer_reviews.text: The base material is MDF, but feels like compressed cardboard, not compressed wood. The side decorative mood-like ( pressed cardboard) pieces falla part the first week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!!!! We've had for over a year and a half and we use it every day. My husband and I eat dinner here every night and it's the perfect size and excellent quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meg R

customer_reviews.title: Take your time putting it together
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this coffee table and how it lifts up to a higher level. There are a lot of pieces that need assembled and it took my handy husband longer than he expected. There are also parts where 2 people are needed during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome table
customer_reviews.text: It did come with a minor chip it the edge of the surface, but we decided that didn't warrant returning it. We love this table. Perfect for those tasks like eating, laptop use or writing. Put the top down and it looks like any other standard coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Deeneece

product_meta.title: Sauder Carson Forge Lift-Top Coffee Table, Washington Cherry finish
product_meta.description: Color:Washington CherryAdd some unique style and functionality to your home with this lift-top coffee table from the Carson Forge collection. The top lifts up and forward creating a multipurpose work surface so you can browse online or eat dinner while relaxing on your couch. Other features include hidden storage beneath the top and open shelves for storing blankets, board games or knick-knacks. This coffee table with lift top is finished on all sides in Washington Cherry and paired with wrought-iron style accents, making it the perfect statement piece in any room.
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 43.15W x 19.45D x 18.98H inches; Height when open: 24.63 inches
Pop-up coffee table top lifts up and forward to create versatile work surface
Open shelves for additional storage and display
Engineered wood construction with wrought iron style accents
Finished on all sides for versatile placement

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,610 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
